name: A Bro's Desire
description:
On a normal day of pandemic, Gael receives a message from a needy friend. Help him on his small journey.

- CREDITING -

Engine: RPG MAKER VX ACE by ENTERBRAIN

You can buy it on STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/220700/RPG_Maker_VX_Ace/

Game by me

Art by JackBee and Vasilva

Pixelart by YourLastHope and JackBee

(the link given in the description seems to not be working, so I decided to link their youtube video instead)

No remixes or further transformations where made. The only change was converting the format from MP3 to OGG (the format accepted by the engine). 
If you can afford, PLEASE donate to these wonderful creators! I absolutely admire their work, but for now, have no money to donate.
